mapper.insert: insert into post_reply(rnumber, rcontent, pnumber, register_date, rwriter) values(seq_reply.nextval, #{rcontent}, #{pnumber} ,sysdate, #{rwriter})
mapper.select: select rcontent, mimage, mnickname from post_reply r, member m where r.rwriter=m.memail and pnumber = #{pnumber} order by rnumber desc
select count(*) from post_reply p where p.pnumber = #{pnumber}
